R

radius - Variable in class panels.Visibility
radius that will be updated and used to draw the circle.
random - Variable in class panels.GamePanel
Random object, used for generating which level version to use.
reset() - Method in class chunks.ChunkManager
Resets ChunkManager.
reset() - Method in class panels.GamePanel
Resets several objects in this class.
reset() - Method in class panels.Visibility
Resets radius and decreaseAmount to default values.
reset() - Method in class sprites.Player
Reset player state and direction.
resetDrawCount() - Method in class sprites.Player
Set the drawcount back to zero.
resetHitCount() - Method in class sprites.Enemy
Set player health back to 100
resetKnockback() - Method in class sprites.Enemy
Stops and resets the knockback effect.
resetLevel() - Method in class panels.GamePanel
Set the level back to the very start
resetOffset() - Static method in class chunks.ChunkManager
Resets the offset.
resetTime() - Static method in class main.Main
Resets the game timer and associated variables.
restart() - Method in class chunks.ChunkManager
Repositions maze so the player goes back to the start block.
restartGame() - Static method in class main.Main
Resets the game and removes the old window and starts a new one
RIGHT_PADDING - Variable in class sprites.EnemyFactory
right padding of enemy.
rightButtonClick - Variable in class panels.HomeScreen
The clicked image for the right facing button
rightButtonDefault - Variable in class panels.HomeScreen
The default image for the right facing button
rightButtonHover - Variable in class panels.HomeScreen
The mouse hover image for the right facing button
rightPressed - Variable in class gameTools.KeyHandler
Boolean used to check if corresponding key is being pressed or is released.
rightSide - Variable in class panels.Visibility
Stores the right side of the visibility shape.
roam() - Method in class sprites.Enemy
Moves the enemy back and forth when it's not tracking the player.
roamingSpeed - Variable in class sprites.Enemy
Speed used when not tracking player.
run() - Method in class panels.GamePanel
When we start the gameThread, this function is ran.
runMainCode() - Static method in class main.Main
Creates window and starts game.
